response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us and is estimated to be worth $1,200,000 to you. We understand the importance of this decision and are committed to ensuring that you receive the best possible deal.

We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value. We believe that this price reflects the exceptional quality and unique benefits of our product, making it an investment that will undoubtedly pay off in terms of both functionality and return on investment.

Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you have any questions or require additional information. We are here to assist you every step of the way and are confident that you will find our product to be a valuable asset.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
